title: Congress to inspect Guantanamo Bay amid migrant detention controversy
shortDescription: The trip by House Armed Services Committee members to see President Trump's migrant detention center could come as soon as Friday.

title: Trump grants US automakers a one-month reprieve on tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has agreed to exempt automobiles from newly imposed tariffs on imports from Canada and Mexico for the next month.

title: Republicans want to censure Al Green after Trump speech
shortDescription: Republicans are launching efforts to censure Rep. Al Green, D-Texas., after his protest during President Donald Trump’s address to Congress.

title: LGBTQ+ groups bash Trump's attacks on trans community: 'Pathetic'
shortDescription: Donald Trump touted executive orders that aim to restrict the rights of transgender Americans in his address to the joint sessions of Congress.

title: Trump administration removes list of 443 buildings targeted for sale
shortDescription: The Trump administration Wednesday removed a directory of 443 federal buildings it had planned to list for sale the previous day.

title: Fashion statements at Trump's address: See what Melania, Elon Musk wore
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's first joint congressional address was an eventful one full of viral moments, including disruptions from opponents on the left.

title: Trump talks DOGE, border during address to Congress | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: House Republicans are being instructed to stop holding in-person town halls after DOGE complaints. | These and more stories on The Excerpt.

title: Greenland Prime Minister says 'we are not for sale' after Trump speech
shortDescription: The Greenland prime minister affirmed that his country is not for sale, after Trump said the U.S. should acquire the territory in his speech.

title: Texas lawmaker who dies at 70 had final message on Medicaid for Trump
shortDescription: Texas Rep. Sylvester Turner warned the GOP before Trump's speech to leave Medicaid alone. It was one of his final messages.

title: Al Green, ejected from Trump’s address, has reputation for defiance
shortDescription: Rep. Al Green disrupted Donald Trump's joint congressional address Tuesday. It's not his first time countering the president, or leading a protest.

title: Fashion makes a statement at Trump's joint address to Congress
shortDescription: See the fashion choices of politicians and guests at Trump's joint address to Congress

title: ISIS-K member charged in Afghanistan bombing against US troops: Trump
shortDescription: Trump said a member of ISIS-K was charged in the Afghanistan bombing that killed 13 US troops in 2021. Mohammad Sharifullah was detained Wednesday.

title: 'How did that work out?' Trump taunts Democrats about criminal charges
shortDescription: President Donald Trump taunted Democrats for refusing to support his priorities and asked after facing four criminal cases: 'How did that work out?'

title: Supreme Court puts a dent in Trump's plans to halt foreign aid
shortDescription: The Trump administration had argued that a federal district judge is interfering in the powers the Constitution gives the president.

title: 'We can't normalize this' Some Black lawmakers walk out of Trump address
shortDescription: Several Black lawmakers walked out of Trump's address, but some stayed. ''This is our House. We’re not leaving,’’ said Sen. Lisa Blunt Rochester.

title: Watch: 'This is not normal' sign ripped away by lawmaker before Trump speech
shortDescription: Rep. Melanie Stansbury, D-New Mexico, held a sign that read “this is not normal" that Republican Rep. Lance Gooden of Texas ripped away.

title: Lawmaker rips sign from congresswoman's hands
shortDescription: Rep. Lance Gooden ripped a sign reading "this is not normal" from Rep. Melanie Stansbury's hands as President Trump entered the chamber.

shortDescription: The demands may further complicate congressional efforts to pass Trump's agenda through thin margins.

title: Six made-for-tv moments from Donald Trump's address to Congress
shortDescription: From moments created by the president to capture attention to interruptions by his opponents, Trump's address to Congress included these key moments.

title: Trump breaks Clinton's record for longest speech to Congress
shortDescription: Clocking in at nearly 100 minutes, President Donald Trump broke former President Bill Clinton's record for longest Congressional speech.

title: Democrats respond to Trump's Congressional address
shortDescription: Sen. Elissa Slotkin delivered the Democratic response to President Donald Trump's speech to a joint session of Congress.
